hero.title: Your Trusted Partner in Building a Secure and Smart Digital Future Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030
hero.welcome: Eazy Cyber Agent is a Saudi company specializing in cybersecurity and digital solutions. We provide integrated services in artificial intelligence, big data, and cloud computing. Our mission is to support both public and private sectors in driving digital transformation and achieving Vision 2030 goals toward a knowledge-based, innovative economy.

about_preview.title: About Us
about_preview.intro: Eazy Cyber Agent is a leading Saudi company at the forefront of cybersecurity and digital transformation. We deliver cutting-edge solutions in artificial intelligence, big data analytics, and secure cloud computing to help organizations thrive in the digital age.
about_preview.vision_text: Leading Saudi Arabia's digital transformation as the premier provider of innovative security and technology solutions
about_preview.mission_text: Empowering organizations with world-class cybersecurity, AI, and data-driven solutions

services_overview.title: Our Services
services_overview.subtitle: Comprehensive cybersecurity and digital transformation solutions tailored for Saudi organizations
services_overview.ai_desc: Advanced AI-powered automation, intelligent chatbots, and predictive analytics to drive business growth and operational excellence
services_overview.cybersecurity_desc: End-to-end security solutions including penetration testing, SOC services, and full compliance with NCA, ISO 27001, and SAMA regulations
services_overview.bigdata_desc: Transform vast data into strategic insights with smart dashboards, data warehousing, and advanced fraud detection capabilities
services_overview.cloud_desc: Enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with Saudi-compliant hosting, disaster recovery, and robust data encryption

industries_preview.title: Industries We Serve
industries_preview.tagline: Empowering Saudi Arabia's key sectors with world-class cybersecurity, AI innovation, and digital transformation solutions

vision2030.title: Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030
vision2030.content: As a proud Saudi company, we are committed to advancing the Kingdom's Vision 2030 goals. Our solutions drive digital transformation across government and private sectors, protect critical national infrastructure, foster innovation in startups and SMEs, and develop local talent through comprehensive training programs. Together, we're building a secure, smart, and sustainable digital future for Saudi Arabia.

contact_cta.title: Let's Secure Your Digital Future
contact_cta.content: Partner with Eazy Cyber Agent to build a secure, smart, and compliant digital future.
contact_cta.benefit1_desc: Comprehensive protection for your organization with world-class cybersecurity solutions
contact_cta.benefit2_desc: 24/7 support and incident response team ready to protect your assets
contact_cta.benefit3_desc: NCA and ISO 27001 certified solutions ensuring regulatory adherence

about.hero_tagline: Empowering a Secure and Smart Digital Future
about.hero_content: Eazy Cyber Agent is a Saudi company specializing in cybersecurity and digital solutions. We provide integrated services in artificial intelligence, big data, and cloud computing. Our mission is to support both public and private sectors in driving digital transformation and achieving Vision 2030 goals toward a knowledge-based, innovative economy.
about.team_content: Our team combines deep technical expertise with a commitment to excellence. It includes certified professionals in cybersecurity, AI, and data analytics, all working together to realize the company's vision.
why_choose_highlights: Localized Arabic solutions for national transformation.
about.cta_heading: Join us in building a secure and intelligent digital future.
about.vision_content: To be the first choice in Saudi Arabia and the region for delivering innovative digital and security solutions that empower organizations to adapt and achieve digital sustainability.
about.mission_content: To empower organizations to build secure and intelligent infrastructures using the latest technologies in AI, big data, and cybersecurity—aligned with the Kingdom's Vision 2030 digital transformation strategy.

core_values.title: Integrity & Transparency
core_values.description: Trust is the foundation of every partnership.

features.security_desc: To be the first choice in Saudi Arabia and the region for delivering innovative digital and security solutions that empower organizations to adapt and achieve digital sustainability.
features.privacy_desc: To empower organizations to build secure and intelligent infrastructures using the latest technologies in AI, big data, and cybersecurity—aligned with the Kingdom’s Vision 2030 digital transformation strategy.
features.certified_desc: Our core values guide every engagement and decision.
certified_points: Integrity & Transparency – Trust is the foundation of every partnership.
Continuous Innovation – Creative solutions for tomorrow’s challenges.
Security First – Safeguarding digital assets against threats.
Customer-Centric – Tailored solutions for every organization.

aiSolutions.section_subtitle: Leverage the power of artificial intelligence to enhance customer experience, boost business efficiency, and make more accurate and effective decisions at the right time.
aiSolutions.chatbot_desc: Provide 24/7 customer service through intelligent chatbots capable of understanding user needs and responding instantly to inquiries, raising customer satisfaction levels and reducing operational costs.
aiSolutions.predictive_desc: Rely on predictive analytics to extract future insights based on data, helping you with strategic planning, risk management, and making informed decisions that promote growth and sustainability.
aiSolutions.threat_title: Intelligent Systems for Real-Time Cyber Threat Detection
aiSolutions.threat_desc: Protect your digital infrastructure using advanced AI systems that monitor and detect security threats as they occur, responding automatically to maintain data security and business continuity.

cybersecurity.section_subtitle: Protect your digital assets and ensure business continuity through comprehensive cybersecurity solutions that keep pace with the latest threats and ensure compliance with the highest global standards.
cybersecurity.pentest_desc: We provide advanced penetration testing to identify security vulnerabilities in systems and applications, with detailed reports and practical solutions to enhance protection levels.
cybersecurity.compliance_title: Risk Management and Compliance with NCA & ISO 27001
cybersecurity.compliance_desc: We help you implement risk management and compliance frameworks according to National Cybersecurity Authority (NCA) standards and ISO 27001, ensuring a secure and compliant digital environment.
cybersecurity.soc_title: Security Operations Centers (SOC) and Incident Response
cybersecurity.soc_desc: Monitor your infrastructure 24/7 through specialized Security Operations Centers (SOC), enabling early threat detection and rapid incident response before escalation.
cybersecurity.training_title: Phishing and Social Engineering Simulation Training
cybersecurity.training_desc: We provide interactive training programs and realistic simulations for phishing and social engineering tests, raising employee awareness and strengthening security culture within the organization.

bigData.section_subtitle: Transform your data into strategic insights and actionable business intelligence through our advanced data analytics solutions, helping you make precise decisions and enhance business efficiency.
bigData.warehouse_desc: We provide comprehensive solutions for designing, developing, and managing secure and efficient data warehouses, enabling you to collect, organize, and transform data into a powerful asset for your organization.
bigData.dashboard_desc: Benefit from interactive and flexible dashboards that provide immediate and comprehensive performance insights, helping decision-makers take informed steps based on accurate data.
bigData.fraud_desc: Quickly and accurately detect suspicious patterns and abnormal activities using intelligent analytics techniques to protect your business and enhance operational reliability.
bigData.governance_title: Data Governance in Compliance with Saudi Personal Data Protection Law
bigData.governance_desc: We help you implement best practices in data governance according to Saudi Personal Data Protection Law, ensuring full compliance and protecting the privacy of your customers and users.

cloudHosting.section_subtitle: Elevate your digital infrastructure through secure and flexible cloud solutions that enable confident expansion and ensure full compliance with Saudi regulations to protect your data and operate your business with high efficiency.
cloudHosting.hosting_title: Secure Hosting Compliant with Saudi Regulations
cloudHosting.hosting_desc: We provide reliable local hosting services that comply with national security and privacy standards, ensuring data protection and meeting regulatory requirements in the Kingdom.
cloudHosting.backup_desc: Protect your data from any emergency through effective backup and recovery systems that ensure business continuity and minimize downtime.
cloudHosting.encryption_desc: Rely on advanced encryption protocols and virtual firewalls to protect your data from cyber threats and enhance the security of your cloud environment.
cloudHosting.iam_desc: Control user permissions and access security through Identity and Access Management (IAM) systems that ensure comprehensive protection and ease in managing users and sensitive tasks.

smeEazy.section_subtitle: The SME-EAZY program is specifically designed to empower small and medium enterprises to protect their digital business through flexible and effective cybersecurity solutions that meet their operational needs and fit their budgets.
smeEazy.layered_desc: We provide an integrated security system that includes technical, operational, and human protection, ensuring comprehensive security against various cyber threats.
smeEazy.packages_title: Low Cost Suitable for SME Budgets
smeEazy.packages_desc: Cost-effective solutions that provide professional-grade protection without financial burden, specifically designed to suit the nature and needs of small and medium enterprises.
smeEazy.risk_title: Practical Training to Build Cybersecurity Culture
smeEazy.risk_desc: We provide interactive training programs aimed at raising security awareness and strengthening protection culture within the organization through realistic scenario simulations.
smeEazy.vision_title: Analytical Tools for Effective Risk Management
smeEazy.vision_desc: Benefit from intelligent analysis tools that help you assess risks, monitor vulnerabilities, and make proactive decisions to protect your data and digital assets.

industries.hero_subtitle: Empowering sectors through innovation, security, and digital transformation.

industries_list.title: Government & Public Sector
industries_list.description: Securing national digital infrastructure, enabling e-government services, and supporting Vision 2030 initiatives with AI-driven automation and compliance solutions.

industries_list.title: Banking & Financial Services
industries_list.description: Protecting financial transactions, detecting fraud with advanced analytics, ensuring regulatory compliance (SAMA, NCA), and delivering secure cloud-based banking solutions.

industries_list.title: Energy & Telecommunications
industries_list.description: Safeguarding critical infrastructure from cyber threats, monitoring OT/IT systems, and supporting smart grid and 5G rollouts with AI and IoT security.

industries_list.title: Healthcare & Hospitals
industries_list.description: Protecting patient data, ensuring HIPAA and local regulation compliance, securing telemedicine platforms, and enabling AI-powered diagnostics and analytics.

industries_list.title: Education & Universities
industries_list.description: Securing online learning platforms, protecting student records, enabling safe digital collaboration, and supporting research initiatives with data analytics and cloud infrastructure.

industries_list.title: SMEs & Startups
industries_list.description: Providing affordable, scalable cybersecurity and cloud solutions tailored for growing businesses, with a focus on agility, innovation, and alignment with entrepreneurship goals in Vision 2030.

industries.vision2030_content: Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030, Eazy Cyber Agent supports national transformation through cybersecurity, AI, and cloud innovation across every industry.

whyChooseUs.hero_content: We are not just a service provider; we are your strategic partner in securing your digital assets and achieving your business goals. Our commitment to excellence, local expertise, and international standards makes us the ideal choice for organizations across Saudi Arabia.
main_points: Certified professionals (CISSP, CEH, CISM, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor)
Full compliance with NCA-ECC, SAMA, and NDMO regulations
Tailored solutions designed for the Saudi market
whyChooseUs.strengths_content: Our team brings together decades of combined experience in cybersecurity, AI, and data analytics. We stay ahead of emerging threats and leverage cutting-edge technologies to protect your organization. As a Saudi company, we understand the unique regulatory and cultural context of doing business in the Kingdom, and we are proud contributors to Vision 2030's digital transformation objectives.
whyChooseUs.certifications_content: We hold and maintain industry-leading certifications and adhere to the highest international standards, including ISO 27001, NCA-ECC, and SAMA cybersecurity frameworks. Our team is certified by globally recognized bodies, ensuring you receive world-class expertise backed by proven methodologies.
whyChooseUs.commitment_content: Your success is our success. We work closely with you to understand your needs, design solutions that fit your environment, and provide ongoing support to ensure long-term security and resilience.

services.hero_content: We provide a range of advanced technical solutions that enable organizations to grow and innovate with confidence. From artificial intelligence to cybersecurity and cloud computing, we offer integrated services that support digital transformation and enhance business efficiency.

service_cards.title: AI Solutions
service_cards.summary: Intelligent automation and predictive analytics for business growth.

service_cards.title: Cybersecurity Services
service_cards.summary: Comprehensive protection compliant with NCA & ISO 27001 standards.

service_cards.title: Big Data & Analytics
service_cards.summary: Transform data into actionable insights for decision-making.

service_cards.summary: Affordable cybersecurity solutions for small and medium enterprises.

Security Operations Centers (SOC) and incident response.
Phishing simulation and cybersecurity awareness training.

Fully aligned with Vision 2030 entrepreneurship goals.
